title.rendered: Yoga Teacher Training in Chelsea NYC | Yogamaya

content.rendered:
Teacher Training

Learn how to teach the classes you love to take. We teach you the root principals of alignment, movement, observation, sequencing, hands-on assisting and yoga wisdom. Most importantly, you will cultivate the heart of a yogi and take your own practice to the next level. Learn, practice, and grow in our supportive environment. In learning to teach others, you might just find yourself.
200hrFAQ >  300hrFAQ >
